title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Sandstone Peak
body: GPS Activities:  Sandstone Peak - The top of the Santa Monica Mtns!       To answer the quiz questions you will need to:  Visit Geocaching.com to learn more about this EarthCache site. Take your GPS and go on a hike to the coordinates provided at Geocaching.com. Log your find at Geocaching.com Then, click the quiz link on Geocaching.com to return to this where you can take the quiz and earn your Sandstone Peak certificate.   Â     Please be patient while the quiz loads. Thank You!(object placeholder)
